explanation:
code_hardening: none
resolve_compilation_errors: Updated vertical callback invocations to onSwipeUp() and onSwipeDown(), ensuring no references remain to the old onSwipeTop()/onSwipeBottom() names.
exception_handling: Preserved the existing try-catch structure exactly, continuing to catch a generic Exception and print the stack trace.
logic_customization: Restructured the vertical swipe detection from an else-if into an else block with its own threshold and velocity checks while keeping the same orientation-gating behavior. Removed all assignments to a result flag and now unconditionally return false so the fling event is not consumed.
refactoring: Simplified control flow by eliminating the result variable and aligning the vertical branch layout with the horizontal branch; applied the renamed vertical callbacks for clarity.
misc: none
